name: Subverse
descr:
[b]Welcome to a new era in adult entertainment! [/b]

Tired of crappy, low effort hentai games? Then enter the Subverse – an old school PC gaming experience developed from the ground up for the discerning adult by a team of filthy apex perverts.


[img]https://media.st.dl.pinyuncloud.com/steam/apps/1034140/extras/05_Lewd.gif?t=1617793402[/img][h2]EXPLORE A WACKY NEW GALAXY[/h2]Discover the [b]Prodigium Galaxy[/b] – filled to the brim with original lore and thick, meaty content. Explore dozens of star systems and hundreds of planets to find all sorts of missions, anomalies and other interesting stuff like [b]sexy bounty hunter squidgirls[/b] that relentlessly stalk you and your equally sexy crew of waifus.

[img]https://media.st.dl.pinyuncloud.com/steam/apps/1034140/extras/01_Navigation.gif?t=1617793402[/img][h2]FIGHT IN SPACE OR PLANETSIDE[/h2]Throw down in either [b]SHMUP[/b]-style space missions dripping with retro nostalgia or take the thinking man’s approach and duke it out on the ground with dynamic [b]turn-based combat[/b]. Mastering both modes will lead to glorious booty so you can upgrade your ship and troops. 

[img]https://media.st.dl.pinyuncloud.com/steam/apps/1034140/extras/02_SpaceCombat.gif?t=1617793402[/img][h2]YOUR OWN SHIP[/h2]The Mary Celeste not only holds the record for fastest sub-light delivery of weed in the galaxy but she’s also your base of operations. Visit your various stations like Engineering, the Hangar and the Locker room to upgrade your forces, or relax in leisure spots like the Bar and your Quarters.


[img]https://media.st.dl.pinyuncloud.com/steam/apps/1034140/extras/04_Treasure.gif?t=1617793402[/img][h2]ROGUE’S GALLERY OF BADASS BABES[/h2]There are no good girls in Subverse. Well, not until you train them, anyway. These are the [b]baddest babes in the galaxy[/b] complete with exceptional combat potential and drop-dead gorgeous looks. Earn their loyalty and get some other exceptional benefits in the process. Like sex.

[img]https://media.st.dl.pinyuncloud.com/steam/apps/1034140/extras/03_Blythe.gif?t=1617793402[/img][h2]UNWIND AFTER A HARD DAY[/h2][b]It’s time for some fully animated StudioFOW-quality rewards! [/b]Experience a diverse array of scenes from 
[list][li]F/F pairings 
[/li][li]F/M pairings 
[/li][li]F/whatever the [b]FUCK[/b] that thing is pairings[/li][/list] all animated by the same team that brought you such cinematic classics as [b]“Bioshag Trinity” [/b]and [b]“Mila Red Riding Hood”[/b]

[img]https://media.st.dl.pinyuncloud.com/steam/apps/1034140/extras/demi_steam.gif?t=1617793402[/img][h2]FEATURES LIST[/h2]

[list][li] No Pay2Win, no Gacha, no Lootboxes and no daily logins. Get rewarded for winning, not for losing
[/li][li] Spend your rewards on unlocking diverse sex scenes, including certain premium ones with the ability to control speed and the moment of climax
[/li][li] An ensemble of waifus to join your crew, all fully voice-acted by an all-star cast of adult voiceover talent
[/li][li] Powered by the latest Unreal Engine 4 tech, this is Studio FOW like you've never seen them before! Beautifully rendered babes and the trademark cinematic quality has been given the next-gen treatment
[/li][li] Cutscenes and animated models drive the narrative forward
[/li][li] Fight in space with high-octane SHMUP missions, or planetside with tactical turn based combat
[/li][li] A pulsating 35+ track OST with chillstep, trap and synthwave tunes
[/li][li] Upgrade your ship and waifu's combat abilities
[/li][/list]
detail:
名称: Subverse
类型: 动作, 冒险, 休闲, 角色扮演, 策略, 抢先体验
开发商: Studio FOW Interactive
发行商: Streembit Ltd
发行日期: 2021 年 3 月 26 日
抢先体验发行日期: 2021 年 3 月 26 日
review: 最近评测: 褒贬不一 (340) - 过去 30 天内的 340 篇用户评测中有 64% 为好评。
全部评测: 特别好评 (8,955) - 8,955 篇用户的游戏评测中有 81% 为好评。
全部评测: 特别好评 (8,955 篇中的 81%) 发布至今
最近评测: 褒贬不一 (340 篇中的 64%) 最近
sysreq:
Windows
最低配置:
需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
操作系统: Windows 8, 10 (64bit)
处理器: Intel Core i3-2100, AMD FX-6300
内存: 4 GB RAM
显卡: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760, AMD Radeon HD 7950
DirectX 版本: 11
存储空间: 需要 25 GB 可用空间
推荐配置:
需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
操作系统: Windows 8, 10 (64bit)
处理器: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
内存: 8 GB RAM
显卡: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 570
DirectX 版本: 11
存储空间: 需要 25 GB 可用空间
